text: The Football Federation Islamic Republic of Iran (; FFIRI) is the governing body of football in Iran. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1920. It became a member of FIFA in 1948 and AFC in 1958. title: Football Federation Islamic Republic of Iran
